entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 07:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: W 9 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls ending in the morning then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
